author: balld
msg: It should do minimal XPointer support now. I reckon I should read the spec at some point to make sure my syntax is right - I just grabbed it from the XInclude draft, which is internally inconsistent.

author: balld
msg: I stole XPathAPI _straight_ from Xalan, just dumped a package directive in the top. DOMStreamer... DOMStreamer... I think I changed the stream method to not require a Document but just simply a Node. Hope so.

author: stefano
msg: fixes possible encoding problem with stylesheet loading
